QuestData.Title: Cultivating an Image
QuestData.Description: Now we have to finish the job of making you as repulsive as those iron dwarves.$B$BThe best way to do that is to base your disguise on the ugly mugs of real iron dwarves.$B$BWhen Tormak's hunting party discovered that wayward prospector, they took the camera he carried. Now, I suppose, we'll get the chance to use it.$B$BTake it with you to Dun Argol, kill some iron dwarves, and record their likenesses in this device. Bring it back once you have enough examples.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Rokar's Camera to record the images of 8 Iron Dwarves in Dun Argol, then return to Scout Vor'takh at Camp Oneqwah.
QuestData.RewardText: These should serve. By Garrosh, these creatures are ugly.
